remarks.format: ## Remarks `AutoResetEvent` 可讓執行緒信號與對方進行通訊。`AutoResetEvent` allows threads to communicate with each other by signaling. 一般而言，當執行緒需要獨佔存取資源時使用這個類別。Typically, you use this class when threads need exclusive access to a resource. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 執行緒藉由呼叫等候信號上`AutoResetEvent`。A thread waits for a signal by calling on the `AutoResetEvent`. 如果`AutoResetEvent`處於未收到訊號，則執行緒會封鎖，等候執行緒目前控制訊號藉由呼叫有可用資源的資源。If the `AutoResetEvent` is in the non-signaled state, the thread blocks, waiting for the thread that currently controls the resource to signal that the resource is available by calling . 呼叫`Set`訊號`AutoResetEvent`釋放等候執行緒。Calling `Set` signals `AutoResetEvent` to release a waiting thread. `AutoResetEvent` 單一等候中執行緒已發行，並會自動傳回為未收到信號狀態之前，會維持為收到信號。`AutoResetEvent` remains signaled until a single waiting thread is released, and then automatically returns to the non-signaled state. 如果沒有任何執行緒正在等待，一直維持信號狀態。If no threads are waiting, the state remains signaled indefinitely. 如果呼叫執行緒時是在收到信號的狀態，執行緒不會封鎖。If a thread calls while the is in the signaled state, the thread does not block. 立即釋放執行緒，並傳回未收到訊號的狀態。The releases the thread immediately and returns to the non-signaled state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不保證，每次呼叫方法會釋放執行緒。There is no guarantee that every call to the method will release a thread. 如果兩個呼叫太接近，使第二次呼叫發生於之前已釋放執行緒，只有一個執行緒在釋出。If two calls are too close together, so that the second call occurs before a thread has been released, only one thread is released. 就如同第二個呼叫並未發生。It is as if the second call did not happen. 此外，如果沒有等候的執行緒時，會呼叫和已經發出信號，呼叫沒有任何作用。Also, if is called when there are no threads waiting and the is already signaled, the call has no effect. 您可以控制的初始狀態`AutoResetEvent`藉由傳遞建構函式的布林值：`true`如果收到信號的初始狀態和`false`否則。You can control the initial state of an `AutoResetEvent` by passing a Boolean value to the constructor: `true` if the initial state is signaled and `false` otherwise. `AutoResetEvent` 也可與`static`和方法。`AutoResetEvent` can also be used with the `static` and methods. 如需執行緒的同步處理機制的詳細資訊，請參閱[AutoResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/autoresetevent.md)概念文件。For more information about thread synchronization mechanisms, see [AutoResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/autoresetevent.md) in the conceptual documentation. .NET Framework 2.0 版中，從衍生自新類別。Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, derives from the new class. 其作用相當於以建立。An is functionally equivalent to an created with . > [!NOTE] > 不同於類別類別會提供存取具名的系統同步處理事件。Unlike the class, the class provides access to named system synchronization events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用一次釋放單一執行緒，藉由呼叫方法 （在基底類別中） 每次使用者按下**Enter**索引鍵。The following example shows how to use to release one thread at a time, by calling the method (on the base class) each time the user presses the **Enter** key. 此範例會啟動三個執行緒，等候收到信號狀態中建立。The example starts three threads, which wait on an that was created in the signaled state. 因為立即釋放第一個執行緒已在收到信號狀態。The first thread is released immediately, because the is already in the signaled state. 這會重設未收到訊號的狀態，如此後續的執行緒封鎖。This resets the to the non-signaled state, so that subsequent threads block. 已封鎖的執行緒不會釋放直到使用者放開它們一次按下**Enter**索引鍵。The blocked threads are not released until the user releases them one at a time by pressing the **Enter** key. 執行緒會從第一個發行之後，它們在另一台等候未收到訊號的狀態中建立。After the threads are released from the first , they wait on another that was created in the non-signaled state. 封鎖所有的三個執行緒，所以方法必須全部釋放呼叫三次。All three threads block, so the method must be called three times to release them all. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用來同步處理兩個執行緒的活動。The following example uses an to synchronize the activities of two threads. 第一個執行緒，也就是應用程式執行緒執行`Main`。The first thread, which is the application thread, executes `Main`. 將值寫入至受保護資源，也就是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 名為欄位`number`。It writes values to the protected resource, which is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) field named `number`. 第二個執行緒執行靜態`ThreadProc`方法，這個方法會讀取寫入的值`Main`。The second thread executes the static `ThreadProc` method, which reads the values written by `Main`. `ThreadProc`方法會等候。The `ThreadProc` method waits for the . 當`Main`呼叫方法、`ThreadProc`方法會讀取一個值。When `Main` calls the method on the , the `ThreadProc` method reads one value. 立即重設，所以`ThreadProc`方法會等候一次。The immediately resets, so the `ThreadProc` method waits again. 程式邏輯可確保`ThreadProc`方法將永遠不會讀取相同的值兩次。The program logic guarantees that the `ThreadProc` method will never read the same value two times. 它不保證`ThreadProc`方法會讀取寫入每個值`Main`。It does not guarantee that the `ThreadProc` method will read every value written by `Main`. 保證會需要第二個鎖定。That guarantee would require a second lock. 每個寫入作業之後，`Main`藉由呼叫會產生方法，讓第二個執行緒來執行。After each write operation, `Main` yields by calling the method, to give the second thread a chance to execute. 否則，在單一處理器電腦上`Main`要用來撰寫兩個讀取作業的許多任何之間的值。Otherwise, on a single-processor computer `Main` would write many values between any two read operations.
